name: Monster (itch) (jsmgamedev)
description:
Place furnitures in your room to look nice and help you with killing all monsters.

You have three difficulty levels. Monster die when is moving to the position occupated by other monster or player position. If player lost live is teleported to random place without monsters. If player teleport it can move to monster position then player lost live and monster die. You win when all monsters are dead. Game over when player lost all lives.

When level is loaded player can place furnitures. To do this select one furniture from bottom of the screen and click. Then move it to the room and place in position. To rotate object use A or D key. To drop choosen item click right mouse button. To remove furnitures from map press it with right mouse button. To move it again click it with left mouse button. When all furnitures are placed click Play button in upper part of the screen.

Control place furniture part:

ESC - quit to main menu.

LEFT MOUSE CLICK - select furniture to place/move.

RIGHT MOUSE CLICK - remove furniture from map.

A - rotate selected furniture left.

D - rotate selected furniture right.

When play button was clicked the game started. Player moved with keys:

W - move up

S /X- move down

A - move left

D - move right

Q - move up left

E - move up right

Z - move down left

C - move down right

SPACE - teleport to random place.

ESC - quit to main menu
